related_questions.question: Contoh percakapan 5 orang tentang borrowing a book the library

answers.answer:
andi : hi guys , how are you ? , have you guys prepared for tomorrow’s lesson

marsya : hi andi , we’re good , what lesson?

andi : it’s english lesson mr. thomas will be teaching us tomorrow but i lost my book

sari : “ oh my god i forgot tomorrow will be the most important lesson , if we dont bring the book mr. thomas will get mad at us “

tono : “ guys relaxx .. we have library in our school “

joey : “ yeah .. that’s right you guys no need to worry mrs . milla will help us to find the book “

andi : “ thank god , i thought our school doesn’t provide us that kind of book we wanted “

marsya : “ well ... let’s go to library then before its close “

andi : “ alright “

related_questions.question:
⬇QUIZ⬇

Sebutkan rumus simple last tense ! 

No ngasal​

answers.answer:
Verbal

  • (+) S + Verb₂ + o/c
  • (-) S + did not/didn’t + +Verb₁ + o/c
  • (?) Did + S + Verb₁ + o/c ?

Nominal

  • (+) S + to be (was/were) + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (-) S + to be (was/were) + not + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (?) To be (was/were) + S + Adj/Adv/Noun

Pembahasan

Simple past tense adalah sebuah kata kerja yang digunakan untuk berbicara tentang aktivitas masa lalu. Simple Past sendiri biasanya menggunakan past verb/verb 2. Keterangan waktu yang biasa digunakan yaitu last week, last night, last month, last year, yesterday dsb.

Contoh kalimat

Verbal

  • (+) She went to Jakarta yesterday
  • (-) She didn't go to Jakarta yesterday
  • (?) Did she go to Jakarta yesterday?

Nominal

  • (+) You were a student last year
  • (-) You were not a student last year
  • (?) Were you a student last year?

Pelajari lebih lanjut

  • 1.rumus simpel past tense dan berikan 3 contoh kalitugas: brainly.co.id/tugas/29713480
  • berikan 15 contoh simple past tense beserta positif, negatif dan interogatif ?? : brainly.co.id/tugas/14440709
  • buatlah 5 kalimat past tense (+) (-) (?) : brainly.co.id/tugas/24486587

Detail jawaban

Kelas : 8

Mapel : Bahasa Inggris

Materi : Chapter 9 — Past tense

Kode Mapel : 5

Kode Kategorisasi : 8.5.9

related_questions.question: 1. they're crossing the treet?2. she's jogging?3. she's buying some pears?4. he's climbing a coconut tree?5. he's reading a newspaper?

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Are they crossing the street?

2. Is she jogging?

3. Is she buying some pears?

4. Is he climbing (up) a coconut tree?

5. Is he reading a newspaper?

Penjelasan:

Present Continuous (?)

"be" (is/are) + Subject + V-ing + (object, dll, optional).

Remember, use "is" for He, She, and it. Use "are" for you, they, we. Use "am" for I. Hope my answer helps you!
